name: Innate Sorcery
trigger: when you unleash your innate magic
effects: for 1 minute, your sorcerer spell save DC increases by 1
for 1 minute, you have advantage on attack rolls of sorcerer spells you cast
limits: you can use this feature twice and regain all uses when you finish a long rest
